name: The Libram of Torment
data: It decreases the users constitution adequately.
It decreases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users intelligence impossibly much.
It decreases the users charisma impressively.
It has tiny armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a good amount.
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
It increases the users shadow resistance somewhat.
It increases the users magical resistance strongly.
When held, the Libram of Torment channels its owner's lifeforce into any
offensive spells they may cast, increasing the damage significantly.
